C_Cpp.clang_format_style: { BasedOnStyle: Chromium, UseTab: Never, IndentWidth: 4, TabWidth: 4, FixNamespaceComments: true, AllowShortIfStatementsOnASingleLine: false, IndentCaseLabels: false, ColumnLimit: 80, AccessModifierOffset: -4, NamespaceIndentation: All,AlignAfterOpenBracket: AlwaysBreak, BinPackArguments: false,BinPackParameters: false, ObjCBlockIndentWidth: 4, ContinuationIndentWidth: 2 }
